content: this pattern is for crocheted pull-on diaper soaker sacks these sacks make nighttime changing easier while your baby is a newborn instead of needing to pull a soaker down or deal with fastening wraps you simply lift the sack up from the bottom change baby s diaper then pull it back down over baby s legs keeping baby warm and the bed dry the sizes include preemie and nb/small it is crocheted in the round with worsted weight 100 percent wool yarn and features ribbing for the waistband at the bottom and an optional drawstring waist and bottom
